title: Radare2 webui - need help setting it up
content: How can you set up Radare2 webui in Kali or Ubuntu or any other OS? I've tried so many different methods but none of them have worked so far. I think both of them are debian based so that might be the reason it isn't working. any suggestions on a distro which it would work?

comments.text: Have you checked the open issues for r2-webgui? You may need to submit one. It is hard to tell though because no details are provided in the above post.

answers_data.content:
radare2 -c='H' <binary> can run radare2 with web interface.
I guess you are using apt-get package manager for installing radare2, r2 deb package has a bit problem (Web interface files aren't available in deb version), It's better to install the latest version of radare2 from git.
